Mengaku Staf Direksi Pertamina, Pria Ini Tipu Pacarnya Rp 49 Juta
03 Nov 2019, 15:21 by Adam Prireza, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Seorang perempuan bernama Herlin, 42 tahun, menjadi korban penipuan oleh kekasihnya sendiri, Kosim, 37 tahun. Selain kehilangan Rp 49 juta, Herlin tertipu janji manis pria yang mengaku sebagai staf Direksi PT Pertamina, yang mengatakan akan menikahi dirinya.
"Awalnya tersangka Kosim dikenalkan temannya ke korban. Dia mengaku bekerja di Pertamina sebagai staf Direksi," kata Direktur Reserse Kriminal Umum Polda Metro Jaya Komisaris Besar Suyudi Ari Seto dalam keterangan tertulisnya, Ahad, 3 November 2019.
Lantaran dimabuk asmara, Herlin kerap memberikan sejumlah uang kepada Kosim. Seiring berjalannya waktu, ia menyadari kalau dirinya sedang ditipu lantaran Kosim tak kunjung menikahinya.
Herlin lantas melaporkan hal tersebut ke Polda Metro Jaya. Tim Sub Direktorat Reserse Mobil Polda Metro Jaya akhirnya menangkap Kosim pada Jumat, 1 November lalu. Saat ditangkap, Kosim sedang bersama dua rekan yang membantunya dalam beraksi, yaitu Rifky dan Baihaki.
Kepada polisi, Kosim mengaku uang yang diberikan Herlin dipakai untuk kebutuhan sehari-hari. "Tersangka beralasan kepada korban uang tersebut digunakan untuk biaya proyek Pertamina yang tengah ia kerjakan," kata Suyudi.
Menurut Suyudi, Kosim juga mengaku kalau dirinya berbohong ihwal pekerjaannya dan janji menikahi Herlin. Atas perbuatannya, Kosim terancam dijerat Pasal 378 Kitab Undang-Undang Hukum Pidana tentang penipuan dengan ancaman hukuman 4 tahun penjara.
text:
Claiming to Pertamina's Board of Directors Staff, This Man Tricked His Girlfriend to Rp.49 Million
03 Nov 2019, 15:21 by Adam Prireza, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - A woman named Herlin, 42, became a victim of fraud by her own lover, Kosim, 37 years old. Besides losing Rp.49 million, Herlin was deceived by the sweet promise of a man who claimed to be a staff member of PT Pertamina's Board of Directors, who said he would marry her.
"Initially the suspect Kosim was introduced by his friend to the victim. He claimed to work at Pertamina as a staff member of the Board of Directors," Director of the Criminal Investigation General of the Jakarta Metropolitan Police Chief Commissioner Suyudi Ari Seto in his written statement, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Because of romance, Herlin often gives some money to Kosim. Over time, he realized that he was being cheated because Kosim would not marry him.
Herlin then reported the matter to Polda Metro Jaya. The Metro Jaya Police Mobile Detective Sub Directorate Team finally arrested Kosim on Friday, November 1. When arrested, Kosim was with two colleagues who helped him in action, namely Rifky and Baihaki.
To the police, Kosim claimed that the money given by Herlin was used for daily needs. "The suspect reasoned to the victim that the money was used to fund the Pertamina project he was working on," Suyudi said.
According to Suyudi, Kosim also admitted that he lied about his work and the promise to marry Herlin. For his actions, Kosim is threatened with being charged under Article 378 of the Criminal Code concerning fraud with the threat of a sentence of 4 years in prison.
